mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mate (id, email, name, area, password, job_period, license, valid) VALUES (MATE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{name}, #{area}, #{password}, #{jobPeriod}, #{license}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE mate SET img=#{img}, job_period=#{jobPeriod}, license=#{license}, area=#{area} WHERE email=#{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATE_REVIEW (id, rate, content, mate_id, member_id) VALUES (MATE_REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rate}, #{content}, #{mateId}, #{memberId})
mapper.update: UPDATE mate SET valid=0 WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.rate, r.content, u.name, u.email, r.rdate FROM mate_review r LEFT JOIN member u ON r.member_id = u.id LEFT JOIN mate m ON r.mate_id = m.id WHERE mate_id = #{mateId}
